1.  I  am more confident than ever that Brett Kavanaugh is not fit to serve on the Supreme Court. 
2.  Dr. Christine Blasey Ford is not only to be believed, but as my friend @CoryBooker said, she is a hero.

Patients should be able to learn how to get medicine for the lowest price - that's just one way to lower prescription drug costs. Here's others I'm working on pic.twitter.com/3hSGVNeDBw

html: UPDATE -Sen Mike Lee is attempting to amend our Patient Right to Know Drug Prices Act to limit the gag order ban to only *some* health plans. We just want to tell people their medicine could be cheaper! What's the problem? I urge my colleagues to join me & vote down his amendment

html: The Senate unanimously passed the Know the Lowest Price Act to stop pharmacist gag orders for Medicare two weeks ago. This bill would simply expand the ban on gag orders to cover patients with ACA coverage. I've fought for both bills and will work to pass this tonight.
text: The Senate unanimously passed the Know the Lowest Price Act to stop pharmacist gag orders for Medicare two weeks ago. This bill would simply expand the ban on gag orders to cover patients with ACA coverage. I've fought for both bills and will work to pass this tonight.

211 children are STILL separated from their families

Parents of 165 of those kids are already deported

In case the President decides to deny it- these are the facts
#FamiliesBelongTogether

html: We will #NeverForget seeing those towers fall, and smoke and ash stain what was once a bright sky. In these last 17 years, the initial shock of #September11th may have worn off – but families affected, and our nation as a whole, face the aftershocks every day.

html: NJans deserve a flood insurance program that works. My #SafeNFIP Act: -makes premiums more affordable -reduces future flooding by investing in resiliency -holds insurance companies accountable -provides a long-term reauthorization.pic.twitter.com/j1zED9FLr7
text:
NJans deserve a flood insurance program that works. 
My #SafeNFIP Act:
-makes premiums more affordable
-reduces future flooding by investing in resiliency
-holds insurance companies accountable
-provides a long-term reauthorization.pic.twitter.com/j1zED9FLr7

html: Just voted to extend National Flood Insurance Program for 4 months. Don't get me wrong - I'm relieved. If it lapsed, thousands of NJans would lose coverage just as hurricane season begins. But we really need reform - my #SafeNFIP Act has bipartisan support. It could have passedpic.twitter.com/sfYZIIzSoo
text:
Just voted to extend National Flood Insurance Program for 4 months. Don't get me wrong - I'm relieved. If it lapsed, thousands of NJans would lose coverage just as hurricane season begins.
